function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Virtual reality and holographic technology may create an illusion of physical presence, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for human-to-human contact during in-store shopping or pick-up","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to technology-mediated solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for sales and interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shoppers may feel on edge and try to keep a distance from other shoppers and employees","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long queues at the store entrance may increase fear of contamination and negative feelings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased store crowding can lead to fear of contamination and decreased customer satisfaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 measures on utilitarian and hedonic shopping value","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of contamination causing barriers to visiting stores and using services","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to social distancing measures in shopping environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited opportunity for enjoyable shopping experiences due to restrictions and fears related to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination fear leading to lack of tactile input when shopping for products, both online and in-store","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 social distancing measures leading to long queues and reduced shopping efficiency","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of e-services and online retailing due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in consumer privacy attitudes due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in consumer behavior towards online shopping and e-commerce","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in stores","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unregulated use of cash payments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consumers’ fear of contamination and increased reluctance to get close to other people and potentially contaminated objects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Severe metamorphosis in the service sector, driven by government regulations safeguarding public health and consumers’ mindset","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overnight change to the physical and social servicescape in response to the containment measures and consumers’ fear of contamination","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in retail settings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of retail establishments leading to economic impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited resources of the government may impact the effectiveness of support for consumer loans in housing and automotive industry","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Backlog in car production due to surge in demand after support for consumer loans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased cooperation between government and financial sector may lead to efficient management of economic crises","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased marketing expenditures in banking and food service industries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accurate pandemic predictions and forecasts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust and reassurance among consumers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of fast and deliberate response to the crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cognitive trust through untact channels and strong relationships in banking services","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to act quickly on learnings and develop innovative service products for food service businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to face-to-face contact in food service industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of decreased customer confidence in banking services","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures in restaurants and cafes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic downturn and recession due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of vaccination availability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in implementing new ways of interaction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of services to the new normal","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personalized experiences leading to customer dissatisfaction and reduced loyalty.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing use of face masks and sanitizers may lead to environmental pollution and waste management issues.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote services and virtual try-ons may lead to a decrease in in-store foot traffic, impacting physical retailers and the local economy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of technology for shelf monitoring and clean surfaces may lead to data privacy and cybersecurity risks.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty and vulnerability to a second wave of infections","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Little prospect of widely available vaccine and second global outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of masks and mask production can contribute to environmental waste and pollution","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
